item.description:
Please join us on a conference call to briefly discuss our next events and your ideas.

 

Boston Waterski Enthusiasts invite you to a conference call:

Conference Dial-in Number    (641) 715-3200       
Participant Access Code:    669378#      
Were you wondering about the area code of "free conference call" dial in number? It’s Columbus, Ohio.
Conference Dial-in formatted for the BlackBerry user: 1 641-715-3200,,669378#   

Contact information for Peter Dwyer
Mobile  617 633-6187

Touch Tone Command Explanations

Mute - *6 key
Press *6 to mute your line. Press *6 again to un-mute the line.

Instructions - *4 key
Press *4 to Play a menu of touch tone commands.

Exit conference - *3 key
Press   *3  To take you, the individual user, out of the conference call and back into the “lobby”.
Boston Waterski Enthusiasts invite you to a conference call:
item.how_to_find_us: Conference Dial-in Number(641) 715-3200 Participant Access Code:669378#
item.name: Season Planning Conference Call
